cohortName: [PL 314381001] Acute febrile mucocutaneous lymph node syndrome referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (314381) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 314381002] Acute febrile mucocutaneous lymph node syndrome referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (314381) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 314381003] Multi-system inflammatory syndrome (Kawasaki disease or toxic shock syndrome) episodes, defined by condition occurrences of 'Toxic shock syndrome or kawasaki disease' conceptset
[PL 314381004] Kawasaki's disease by Kao, First  event of Acute febrile mucocutaneous lymph node syndrome [MCLS] during inpatient or ER
